content: This game is soo addictive and good! I bought the pro version because this dev. didn't put a single add on his free version and I really love that.
Very nice how ever non laptop compatability is on this sooo yea small issue but i got it on my phone
Can someone help me how do you upload your editor maps in User maps?
replyContent: Thanks for reply. If you want you can email me (yiotro93@gmail.com) with level code of your map. I'll add it to the game if I'll like it. Level code is a text that appears in your clipboard after you press 'export' in editor.

content: I havnt even played the full version but when i saw no ads i was sold when i played the free version i didnt get that much ads a few from time to time (like 30 minutes apart) and i really loved that. i bought this because i wanted to make levels and support the developer but mostly support the developer they make really good games so i suggest that you buy this or just get the free version oh and yiotro KEEP UP THE GOOD WORK CUZ YOU ARE THAT DUDE! No problem Yiotro you make very good games

I love this game. The creator respects it's players. It is a game worth playing. If I could change this game to improve it in any way I would give the option to choose where a single unit it looking. So if you're holding down a position you can manually tell your units where to look without having to try 100 times
replyContent: Thanks for good reply. You can kinda do that already, just longtap a cell near swat members and choose 'check spot'.

content: I could swear I saw a 4 legged chair running on level 49.
replyContent: Thanks for reply. Yeah, it was there ;)

content: I never review mobile games, let alone buy them, but after playing the free version and the developer taking into consideration no ads and micros, it sold it for me. It made me want to give back as its such a fun game! It's quite unique which is hard to find on mobile games these days. Beauty in the simplicity, its not too difficult but it's not boring which is a great balance. Looking forward to your future games and updates!
Yet another amazing strategy game from Yiotro! Simple mechanics, deep gameplay, clever and sprawling level design, intuitive UI. Genius.
Very good addictive game keeps you're interest for a change
Easily my favorite game developer! Thanx for all this great stuff yiotro!!
when will we have new levels:"(
replyContent: Thanks for reply. I plan to make an update soon, it will add new user levels. New campaign levels may be added in future but currently I can't promise that.

content: Love it. Its really an amzing game, and I really respect the developer, so I decided to buy the pro version, its a great strategy game, you should try it. Also, I have one suggestion, would it be possible to add more than one floor? I feel like that would improve the editor and just the game in general a lot. Anyway, thanks for creating this game.
replyContent:
Thank you for your support :)
About your idea: I was thinking about it but decided not to implement such thing because of problems that it may cause. Also, some user levels are structured like a floors in one building (each floor is a separate level).

content: Revolutionary. Lags a bit
replyContent: Thanks for reply. About lags: please try to change graphics in game options, it should help.

content: See my review in the free version. Yes. I bought the upgrade. And I'm a cheap ass!

This is a very well put together game, I was looking for something just like this and there's not many out there. You did a fantastic job, the consideration with no ads, not micros, just awesome. I would happily pay more for it, to not only support you but to see where you could possibly take this game in the future. Excellent job my friend.
replyContent: Thanks for good words and for your support :)

content: Normally I don't rate games that often but this one is definitely a good purchase, and the only 1 thing that I would really like to be improved which is customizability for the map editor (stuff like more tile options like road tiles and maybe also half walls that can be shot over, and being able to stack furniture so the TV doesn't always have to go on the floor), but other than that it's a great mobile game
replyContent: Thanks for good reply. I may add more tiles in future but currently I can't promise that.

content: I originally thought it was repetitive since you just throw in a grenade, walk in, and arrest everyone. And I stopped playing for a while because of this. Then I got bored one day and picked the game back up.. The difficulty and different grenades really spiced up the game and made me think and plot the best ways to complete the objective. Great top-down strategy shooter! The free version has enough content on its own, but I would highly recommend the full version for additional levels.
I rarely pay for a game, but after having played many if not all of the games Yiotro freely and generously has to offer, it is well deserved. Spectacular work.
Pretty good game in my opinion, the controls take getting used to but overall it's a very fun yet simple experience.

Thank you for working hard to build such an amazing experience. I played the free version and didn't know there was a paid version. You don't have any interruptions nor pop ups so thank you. I love building my own strategy games so this is going to be fun. It's a simple setup but great strategy. I love the changing sincerity makes it interesting. Its hard to find a good game like this one.
replyContent: Thank you too for good words :)

content: Its honestly great, the only thing i wish was that there was a game with these mechanics, but you instead played as soldiers and actually killed your enemy soldiers, a good game in my opinion.
Excellent game. A really good work done by developer. Kudos!!
This game is really amazing. Got to give gratitude to the Developer. The game is really good and the gameplay is amazing. A small price to pay to support the Developer and for some extra levels etc.
Its a fun game that doesn't scream at your wallet

I really like the game but there's a missed opportunity I'm not sure if I'm the only person who has this problem it should have a feature in the pro version of the game where when you make your own level it will tell you how to use the Waypoints for the suspects and in quick level mode maybe you can increased increase the number of officers you can have and another idea is where you could pick up a dead body of another officer and you can put him in a room where he could come back to life
replyContent: Thanks for ideas. If you want you can email me (yiotro93@gmail.com) and I will tell you how to use waypoints in editor.

content: Great game!! It's not easy to find a good game. It's impossible to find a good game without micro payments.
Absolutely love it no flaws love you yiotro
Cute and great....
Dude ive only ever payed for 2 gamees mekorama and this.well done bro
This needs an editor tutorial, it's too confusing
Very good game! Please also consider a savegame feature, it's frustrating (mainly in some user-made level) to be one room away from victory and having instead to make the entire level again!

It's ok, but trying to get the individual swat members to look in a specific direction can be a pain in the *bleep*. Also, The selection panel makes no sense as far as the colors go. all swat members are one color but the selection panel has two. Why limit the colors?! makes selecting individual members frustrating. Too many instances where I've had swat members die while i'm pulling my hair out trying to select the right member or just trying to get them to face the right direction.
replyContent: Thanks for reply. Please enable 'selection panel' in game options. With it you will have much more flexibility in selecting your units. About making swat members look in specific direction: I'll do something about it in next update, but meanwhile I recommend you to use blockers on doors, it's the best tactic :)

content: I absolutely LOVE this game. I've been looking for a good game for a while and I looooove this. I love the level editor to. Most definitely worth the money.

The game is fantastic but as a editor games lover i would like you to add a lot of furnitures and to objects. A feature that can place some door, furnitures etc with and without grid. In the units i would like you to add a controllable suspect, because i would like to make a level that a suspect need to escape, but not just escape the objectives are apply the same as what the og objectives from the game but on reverse. I would like to add a lot, but this is just for now. I paid and paid respect.
replyContent: Thanks for ideas and for support.

content: What should I say other than this developer is what each and everyone should strive to be for. Making beyond excellent games and opting for very ethical monetary scheme. Even the demo versions of his/her games don't pale much to the full versions with just a few features cut. Yeah.. And the game.. As I said, it's excellent. One of the more unique genres on mobile and well realized at that. A bit sensitive controls which causes some mis-clicks sometimes but nothing game breaking. Surprisingly extensive options for storming the rooms and spaces.

Recommended to everyone...100% worth the money! This game is provided with no ads to begin with...the least i can do for the developer is purchase pro version to show my thanks! No ads no crashes and very well put together. Are you making more?...cause I'd buy them all! One suggestion...there should be a way to capture someone in just the right way to turn them into your swat team.
replyContent:
Thanks for support :) 
You can also check some of my other games: achikaps and bleentoro.

content: I really like the game, the only issue i have found is that the level editor desperately needs an undo button
Simple yet fun, with difficulty levels appropriately scaled. Great game overall.
I just like the game
Update my Review: Please update this perfect game. I have finished all tasks and levels. Please add new things. Thank you so much.

Excellent game. Question, could you add a new way to upload missions? A 'mini campaign' where you add two or more missions, and you play the missions in chronological order. There could also be cutscenes in between where we can have 'units', and move them at certain points, make them say stuff, shoot people and switch weapons (e.g. fist to pistol). Wouldn't that be fantastic? Anyway. This is a fantastic game. Well done, Yiotro!
replyContent: Thanks for good reply. This is an interesting idea, I'll think about it :)

content: I would like if you can add weather like a storm at random ,any level . But honestly a perfect game
replyContent: Thanks for idea, I'll think about it.

content: I LOVE THIS GAME KEEP UP THE AMAZING JOB

great developer. doesn't try to monetize apps by spying using unneeded permissions and/ or forcing ads down our throats. so much respect for that approach. the only way for devs like him to get paid is through our purchases of their paid apps though. since 99.99% of us couldn't make an app if we were paid to, it's unreasonable to expect others to do it for free.
Very good game
I very quickly got addicted to this game. I've always loved tactical military games like Rainbow 6 And Ghost Recon and this game is like those games but from a top down perspective. I love it!
I love this game its the perfect swat simulator on the store, but i think it could have a little more objectives than the onse right now, but other than that its a really great game!

Its a great little gem, and a perfect time waster, has a few problems though as the AI can be pretty stupid sometimes which can be easy taken advantage of on occasion so tactics go a bit out the window. There's also a lot of items that have different names and similar uses so it can be a little confusing early on. Great game, especially for one that is so cheap! My biggest complaint is just with the editor, it doesnt warn you that youll lose a level if youve made if you dont save before testing
replyContent: Thanks for reply. I agree, it can be very annoying. I'll try to think about some solution of this problem in next update.

content: Tbh u should have to pay just for free version. This game could be ported to pc on steam and it would still be great. Only thing is that i found a glitch where a red stickman can sometimes glitch thru a blockade on a door. Pls fix but this game is still the best mobile game I ever played (right in front of milkman karlson) :)
replyContent:
Thanks for good reply :) 
About suspects walking through blocked doors: that's interesting, I thought that I already fixed it. I'll check it out again, thanks.

content: High quality just not well known

Ad multiplayer?coop?Also add a go back to editor button when you are testing.I was making a map and forgot to save before testing I beat the map and then lost everything I worked on.Can you add a button where you can control one SWAT/Spy with buttons?like a joystick button to move around and a shoot button and have 1 half of the screen aim the guy and the other half move the guy.Also allow us to edit what the SWAT/Spy has for a weapon(fists included)Also make suspects/spy/swat attack with fists.
replyContent: Thanks for reply. Multiplayer would be nice but it's really hard to do, so I can't promise that. About 'go back to editor': I'll think about that (autosaving the map on launch should help). I thought about joystick controls for single unit and I am still thinking about it. The problem with is that it requires landscape screen mode.

content: This is a strategic app for arresting bad guys and using unique weapons to clear rooms and save the day!
Unique tactical room clearing game. Fun

It's such an amazing game to play during a long flight when you don't have internet ( offline ). I just spend all my International flight playing it! Edit: I loved the new update that show when a SWAT get shot!! üòÑ

It is a great game but I found it to be way too repetitive. I like the premise of it and the game is unique but playing this just made me bored and frustrated at the levels but don't stop that from discouraging you from playing this or buying the pro. It is a great game for people that like unique strategy but it wasn't for me and if the dev is reading this, then I just want to say that you have a good future in videogames :)
Great and your welcome

A clean and simple game that is actually worth spending money on. I loved the free version a lot, and wanted more, so I buyed this to support the developer. The controls are good, the concept is fun, and the execution is phenomenal. Not all good games need to have complicated concepts and art, and this game proves it. I also love the other game, Achikaps.
Very clean, very enjoyable. Yiotro seems to know what he's doing.

This game is simple but fun and slightly challenging at later levels. Really, the developer deserves money. The level editor is also a great feature, however, i would prefer having more flexible objectives that we can set ourselves. This game is essentially perfect.
replyContent: Thanks for good reply. In recent updates I actually added ability to manually choose goal type in editor. If you want you can email me (yiotro93@gmail.com) and I will provide you more details.

content: Great game, great developer. Well done!

It's very fantastic. I moved from the free to the paid version. You guys should add an ability to tell where arrested civilians and suspected should go instead of staying in their own rooms. Right after they get arrested, armed suspects get alarmed and that ruins the stealth.
replyContent: Thanks for reply. I'll think about that. Currently the idea is that you need to use blockers and plan your route strategically to use as few of them as possible.

content: Very well thought out and designed game. Simple control yet complex gameplay. I brought it on a deal, regret that. Worth every penny. Highly recommended.
This is the first game that I bought on store. I loved this game. I wish few cosmetic changes. But overall it's superbüëåüèº
It's so good!

This game is so awesome! It's simple to play yet very challenging... I'd like to see disarmed red characters be able to rearm themselves if they aren't arrested fast enough and they can get near another armed red character
replyContent: Thanks for idea, I'll think about it.

content: Good game but control could be better. When handling multiple squads there are times where even when sepetated by multiple rooms you have not entered. The units still path through the rooms and die even though you were trying to control the other squad.
replyContent: Thanks for reply. Is there a way to reproduce this problem with high chance? If yes then please email me (yiotro93@gmail.com) about that.

content: Its nice to play

Awesome! I'm totally hooked. Great fun on a 10" tab... Team colours could be visible on the guys and team/member selection could still be improved. Tap guy to select/deselect, perhaps. Sometimes hard to get the right door selected, when trying to storm via different entry points...
replyContent: Thanks for reply. Hint: you can enable 'selection panel' in game options, it will allow to select each unit manually.

content: I love you game but I would like it if whin storming a room you could do the commands shot all in room and shot if shot at for both you will lose points for killed civilians but not enemies. I also would like a game mode where the objective is to kill all enemies. Thank you. EDIT: I improved my grammar that's it.
replyContent: Thanks for ideas, I'll think about them.

content: A dark mode would be nice.
I love the game, but maybe you can add vents or jump through windows or toss grenades through windows? Or add a juggernaut or armoed enemies? That would be so cool!
replyContent: Thanks for ideas, I'll think about them.

content: Amazing game overall STILL really helps me get through quarantine,and then they add riots and protests to the mix,if you think about it our world is being destroyed even more before we even fully recovered

I think it is a really fun strategy game. But I have now tried to make several different maps under the editor and every single time it has crashed. But although it crashes, the creator has been really good at answering back to the gmails and reviews he gets.
replyContent: Thanks for reply. Please email me (yiotro93@gmail.com) about this problem. I need more details to be able to fix it. Do I understand right that it crashes only when you're trying to launch it in play mode?

content: I love gameplay, the campaign seems to have had a lot of filler levels but they weren't bad in terms of decoration Overall the editor was a must have featur like in most games, I'd like things such as immobile SWAT cars that deploy 6 SWAT units, I'd also like different types of swat similar to the suspects' variety
replyContent: Thanks for ideas, I'll think about them :)

content: I genuinely love this game thanks, I'm more than happy to buy the full version, thanks for the game! ‚ù§
Awesome!
Good only problem is the map editor it's too finiky and I make many mistakes making a map it could use a undo and redo button
replyContent: Thanks for reply. Yes, I plan to improve editor UI in nearby updates.

content: Amazing game. I rated the free ver the same. The editor is amazing. But, how do I publish levels?
replyContent: Thanks for good reply. You can send me (yiotro93@gmail.com) the level code (press 'export' in editor) and I'll add it to the game (if it's good) :)

content: I never write reviews and I have never bought an app. With that said, I bought the pro version of this game and I am writing this short review. Bravo! I love your cryptic named games. Antiyoy is another favorite. Thank you!
replyContent: Thank you too for your support :)

content: Hi again, great game. But how do u play the investigation mode? Updated: noted. Thank u.
replyContent: Thanks for reply. I recommend you to check out level 24, it's a tutorial for this game mode. The idea is simple: you have to collect clues and use them to detect which suspect is the one you're looking for. Also, you can email me (yiotro93@gmail.com) about that if you want.

content: Great thanks üëç
Great game!
ABSOLUTELY AMAZING IT IS THE BEST GAME I HAVE EVER PLAYED ON MOBILE!!!!!!!i really recommend it for people who love to play game's. BTW is there a finish to the mini games? like can you win them?
replyContent: Thanks for good review. No, these mini games are infinite :)

content: What a game. A simple premise, infinitely replayable, no hidden costs or ridiculous grind. With a great random level generator and a campaign with difficulty scaling, this SWAT style game is great fun. Having an editor is just the icing on the cake, allowing for easy creation with auto and manual placement of rooms, units and furniture. This game is brilliant and I hope to see more!

It is pretty impressive not gonna lie, i feel like it has the potential on becoming not only a Swat/Spy simualtion, Like adding maybe suspects who have melee weapons wich would bring a lot of new ideas for user made maps such as zombie survival, suspects who have shields that could block incoming frontal shots from the swat/spy forcing the players to have another swat/spy go around and kill/shoot from behind....anyway overall in my opinion it's amazing!!!
replyContent: Thanks for ideas, I'll think about them :)

content: Great app a few ideas you could implement though, -Use the darkness of rooms as stealth -Be able to take equipment from enemies like grenades -use walls as covers
replyContent: Thanks for ideas, I'll think about them.

content: Great game, great developer. Look forward to more Yiotro games!
The game is really good, but what is better is that the dev doesn't cram ads down the players' throat.
Fun strategy game. Great developer that doesn't force ads down your throat. Happy to support.

The enemies and SWAT team can make use of ammo/power supplies and secret routes as a surprise. The ammo supplies can contain different grenades, rockets, guns, sheilds, etc. The power supplies can be used to run different appliances in the arena/room and darkness and obstacles can be used to introduce stealth. The secret routes may include tunnels, hidden doors, trapdoors, etc. I have been waiting to play it in the multiplayer mode in the SWAT team. It can be better.
Amazing game, stairs to another floor would be epic as they're quite quick rounds.
Great game with no ads even on the free so I thought help on of my favourite devs out and pay some money to support him/her
Liked it so I bought it Reminds me of swat on the pc. Really great game. THANK YOU
Great game. Btw how do I remove scripts in editor?
replyContent: Thanks for reply. To delete a script do this: 1. Tap on it. 2. Delete all the text in text field. 3. Press 'enter' (or any equivalent on your keyboard).

content: Great game keeps me engaged. Fun way to pass the time too. Developer is quick to reply.
Violent game that involves strategy vice microtransactions. I enjoy this. I paid for other games because I like this developer.
Definitely a great developer here, I had to purchase Pro to support you! Try the free version, realize what a fantastic game it is, and buy Pro.

I really like this game. If I could make some suggestions. Bad guys should be able to unarrest captured bad guy. Bad guy should be able to use flashbangs. Different types of swat members might be cool. Overall, I think the bad guys need a buff as they have become easy to beat. Thanks for making this game.
replyContent: You're welcome. And thanks for ideas, I'll think about them.

content: I love tactical strategy

- Ability to decide where or how the swats will position ie writing a line for the first swat and indicat were the other will be. - Ability to divide teams also ability to directly select them instead of having a toggle button red blue all. - ability to tell the direction of view of a swat without moving. - also, can I remove non pro or should I have both apps?
replyContent: Thanks for reply. Yes, you can remove free version. Also, I recommend you to enable 'Selection panel' in game options, this way you will be able to manually select swat members.

content: This should be the standard in the mobile video game industry. Tutorial isn't too long or frustrating, no ads or microtransactions, just one payment for the game, this is how games should be done

Great game, really enjoyable. Even better developer! NO ADS AT ALL on free version, only a prompt when all levels completed for Pro Upgrade. Pro version has even more levels! Very reasonable price, if you enjoy playing the game til that point you will most probably get Pro. Honestly very impressed, keep up the good work!

Kept me amused far longer than most games. Some of the user levels are even better than the originals. It's nice to pay to support and get the editor, although the extra levels felt a bit like more of the same.

Love your stance on no ads or microtransactions. Wish more designers felt the same way. Please keep making great games: hours of fun, simple graphics, and light on file size, but very challenging and entertaining.

It really is cool but there should be like a shadow mode where its really dark but your team still has a little bit of light following them and lamps give off light and people give off light to and there would be cameras that you can get chught by it would set off a alarm and a bunch of people come after you and would fail and you would do it again. But spys have to disable the security system or rob somthing and exit.
replyContent: Thanks for idea, I'll think about it.

content: Would be 5/5 if there was a way to see what the new updates were our a few missions to see how the new items work. It would be nice if what was updated could also be seen in the game, and/or the information in the game was more informative. Really great game though! Keep up the great work!
replyContent: Thanks for reply. 1. Just tap on a script, delete all text and press 'enter. This will remove the script. 2. Application doesn't have internet permission for that. After you pressed 'export' you can just longtap any text field and press 'paste'. My email is yiotro93@gmail.com. 3. Icons are different. Pro version has little red line at the bottom.

content: Another game from my favorite mobile dev? Take my money, good sir.

I think this is a fantastic game, it thrives on its simplicity. If possible it'd be nice to see the addition of being able to control two squads. I.e. Two groups of 2. Would allow for another layer of tactical thinking. Could cover yourself better or even storm rooms from more than one door etc.
replyContent: Thanks for good reply. You already can do that :) Just use button in bottom left corner of screen (to switch selection) and 'wait for signal' command to sync two groups.

content: Never thought such a small and simple game would be that much entertaining. Most importantly free version is kept clean from annoying ads RESPECT üôè
Awesome game. Simple yet complex. I just would like to see a better title?
replyContent: Thanks for reply. What's wrong with title? :)

content: I think this game is really enjoyable but adding some real weapon sound like silenced mp5 would be greatful.
replyContent: Thanks for reply. I'll think about it.

content: This game is actually pretty fun, I kinda got an idea for an update after playing, there should be moving enemies, audio can be heard from them, but are immune to 1 stun, they will fall, making them stop and be visible on the map, I hope this idea becomes reality
replyContent: Thanks for idea, I'll think about it.

content: THANK YOU for making a real game. No microtransactions, penny pinching, predatory tactics that exploit human nature, etc. Very fun game and dev is very responsive to issue reports and other gameplay enhancements.

This game was well worth the money I paid. The free version had no ads no microtransactions no b.s. So I gladly gave this man my money for a good game with a relaxed approach to enticing people. Good work dev. I will be checking out more of your stuff. üòÅ
Great game, strategic but fun.

Amazing, one of the few games I have gladly bought to support the dev...I grew up playing the SWAT series of games and this a brilliant take on that genre! I highly recommend this game to anyone who likes a real tactical simulator but with a fun graphical style!

Update: works It's fun enough, however I get random crashes when trying to storm rooms occasionally. Sucks because this didn't happen on the trial version but I purchased and the first paid level bugged out on me
replyContent: Thanks for reply. I'm sorry for this problem. Please update to latest version, it's already fixed.

content: Played the free version, loved it and bought the Pro version
This game is exactly as the developer described a very simple tactical game (with a few Easter eggs) I appreciate the ability to edit and the thought that was placed into this game. Thank you.
I love the editor. It is fun to raid things like homes, hospitals, maybe even military bases that i make.

Hi, thank you for the game. I came to the part in vodobanka free where you remind the player about the work you put in to it, so I bought the pro version. I thought that you deserved it bc you dont put ads and trackers on your apps. I also love antiyoy and several other games you made! If you keep it on, I will be here!
Excellent value. I'm happy to support this developer.
Bought this solely because the dev decided against including ads, and seems like a cool guy. Thanks!
Excellent game, takes a while to get really challenging but enjoyable puzzles on every level that can be approached differently every time
good concept, hope the controls are simpler, I suggest tap twice and hold to bring up a circular manul, reduce tap.

This is such a great game tbh and I just downloaded this cuz I was just trying different games and I found this. I hope for more content and yeah, keep up the great work. I could suggest though an ability to control the Swat completely like where the SWAT will shoot cuz hidden suspects from the sides really kill me.( Gun options for SWAT too like suspect) This is a game worth sharing to my friends!
Played the game, pleasantly surprised by the lack of ads every 20 seconds. Found out that there was a paid version so have my money!
Another great game from Yiotro
Great app, responsive and great dev

Pretty good game. Does exactly what it offers - no changes to the core gameplay but more levels and a few tweaks. After exploring every room you now get double speed to arrest everyone, but this just shows the dev is aware of this operation being a drag, doesn't make it more engaging. Missions are now colored red green and yellow based on how well you did. This is nice as the ranking has some slight meaning. Level editor is quite powerful. More campaign works as expected and plays well
Excellent fun tactical app
Such a fantastic game. Only thing to complain is could not make SWAT team to look at our desired direction.
replyContent: Thanks for reply. You can long tap on a cell and choose 'Check spot' to make swat look there.

content: I like this game. In my opinion, it could have some week chalanges, in which you competitive with other players for best result. P.s. you make great games!
replyContent: Thanks for good reply. I'll think about your idea. It's kinda hard to implement, so I can't promise that.

content: Bought for the editor. Editing was ok but would crash EVERY time I tried launching my map. Got a refund.
replyContent: Thanks for reply. I'm sorry that you had this problem. You could have emailed me about it and I would fix it with update.

content: Another win by this developer, clean and simple design but engaging and enjoyable!
Simple and as tactical as you want to be, fun little game when I'm on the job site
One of the best game ever. Great work done. Thanks for making something this fun.
Just buy it. So tactical like swat 4
worth all nintey-nine pennies and then some, my absolute favorite developer :)

This game Is extremely fun. Starts off easy, but does get challenging. Very well executed game. I recently payed penny's for a few more levels, and an editor option. This can be a little difficult to use, and could do with a little tweek. But well worth the money.

awsome game! only things I would like to see done to it in the future are maybe swat member auto watch the closest door to them? some kind of gold aquiring system and upgrades you can buy with earned gold to improve your team such as faster movement, maybe armour. also it would be nice if after a level and you select "arrest all" it would just instant do it so you dont have to wait for everyone to be arrested
replyContent: Thanks for reply. Thanks for ideas, I'll think about them.

content: I really enjoy this game!
I really just bought this to support the developer for making such a great game.
Simple and entertaining. I really like the new Wait for Signal command allowing to sync two attacks.

Excellent Game! Played until the free levels ran out and the happily paid the .99 cents for the full version. Fun game, great replay value, make your own levels, all I ask is for the dev to make more games!!!
Love it! Great CQB tactics. I was searching for a tactics game like this for awhile now but couldnt find it anywhere except Doorkickers.
Just uninstalled the Vodobanka, because i acquire the pro version! Congratulations for the very cleaver game. Greetings from Brazil :)
Another good one.

Very good game with very reasonable price, even the free one is very good with no ad. Simple mechanic, easy to understand, nice graphic. If u like the free version go on buy the paid one it worth every penny. Ps. How many space rocket grenade efective range?
replyContent: Thanks for good reply. Rocket grenade affects everyone who is further than 4 cells from explosion. The idea is that you have to use sho grenade or scarecrow to get units in one corner and then throw rocket at opposite corner.

content: Doorkickers is almost too hardcore for mobile, this keeps the good parts. Love it!

This game is a lot of fun. It's simple, good AI, lots of free levels, and no ads. Played for a solid hour, uninterrupted, before undecided I had to buy the full version - and my progress carried over! Very pleased, kudos to the developer! I look forward to checking out other games in the future.

Yes but you still haven't fixed the swat shooting bug, they sometimes don't shoot when they stand still, even if they are 2 blocks away behind him or beside him, other than that this game is very smooth 10/10 really cool I wish there was more Grande's and gagets like a drone that you control or idk something like a drill to shoot trough. (also thx for the response this is a very good game! Also take inspiration from other games like rainbow six siege)
replyContent: Thanks for reply. That's sad. Main problem with this bug is that I don't know how to properly reproduce it, which making analyzing it almost impossible. I'll try again, but I can't say when I will be able to do that.

content: This is my 1# favorite game for Google play store because of the simple graphics, easy controls, and fun gameplay. One problem I have is that my SWAT team might not shoot the suspect and all of them die, but overall I like it. I've played doorkickers and the problem with that game is that it feels like a game I would play on PC, not my phone. Only reason I got the paid version is because the user made maps are bad so I want to make my own. All of his game have no ads and free, that's a good deal
This game is so amazing. Only thing I don't understand is how to give suspects weapons in the editor. Otherwise great game.
replyContent: Thanks for good reply. To give suspect a weapon just tap on him and then tap 'pistol' icon in left part of screen.

content: Enjoying this game! After the update, it fixed the bug I was having. Yiotro, keep making great games!
replyContent: Thanks for reply. Please update to latest version, this problem is fixed there.

content: I never buy games (bought this one to support you) but I love your business model no ads and you deliver brilliant gameplay and I've enjoyed your other games they are the ones I keep playing..
I love this very simple game. I even bought the 1.99 verson. Thank you for the great game
replyContent: Thank you too for your support :)

content: Love all of your games. What program language do you use and what engine/compiler do you use? Thank you!
replyContent: You're welcome. I write my games in Java. Also I use libGDX framework, mainly for graphics. IDE - Intellij IDEA.

content: Fantastic game. Simple concept, yet endless methods and hours of fun. I very rarely (and I mean at most once in any six months) pay for an app, but this is more than worth it. I echo some of the previous feedback RE room clearing (perhaps individual positioning?) Can't wait to see this develop into a perfectly rounded game!

What an elegant SWAT game, for appearing seemingly simplified it actually has the majority of mechanics I look for in a full tactical game and a decent amount of gadgets; a few quite unique and what caught my eye initially. I'm also a fan of the quick game mode for having a little something random and unexpected for a fast session, alongside the quite extensive campaign for what appears at first to be a little game. I also appreciate allowing me to outright pay you for your game instead of making it some "freemium" thing or the like, this is oddly rare on mobile. edit: What I thought was a bug was just a bit of misunderstanding of the mechanics, maybe should be tutorialized a bit, it's been pretty smooth otherwise. Simply great fun. This dev really loves what they're doing, bless their heart.
replyContent:
Thank you for good review :) 
I would appreciate if you email me (yiotro93@gmail.com) with more information about that bug.

content: Like "Doorkickers" but simplified and much better suited for mobile. Similar strategic depth without the finicky movement route controls. Also has some sweet arcade minigames. Sometimes I still get the occasion where 1 SWAT guy and an enemy are standing face to face, 1 tile away and neither of them shoot or move or do anything until I tap to move my guy. It doesn't happen overly often but if that gets fixed, then the game will be practically flawless. Thanks for the great game once again Yiotro!

This game is amazing. It is fun, interactive and challanges your brain in many different ways. The only problem I have with it is that some charachters will not move where they are supposed to go or just ignore suspects all together. Otherwise, this game is amazing.
replyContent: Thanks for reply. About characters not moving: maybe you accidentally tapped button in bottom left corner of screen? About ignoring suspects: I'll try to fix that soon.

content: I honestly only bought this game to support the developer for all the fun I've had with antiyoy. No ads no pay wall and no internet required and hours upon hours of fun. This is the only way which I felt appropriate to pay them back. Thanks!!!
Great game takes a bit to learn but very entertaining. I also bought it because of Antiyoy. It easily the best game I have played on a phone. Great work, thanks for making truly great mobile games.
Very nice

I've been a fan of Antiyoy for a few years now, and I decided to give a few other games a try. This game is a ton of fun, but without feeling too serious. It's another quality game from a quality creator. If I'm not playing this game, then I'm playing Antiyoy, or yioFiller. Which means that I never eat or sleep. I'm so hungry & tired!
Great publisher and this games add to the list of great games.

Love this game! Also that there are no ads, micro-xsactions and any other 'distractions' ... Update: Fantastic response & support from the developer! The selection panel has been restored with a toggle to select your preference. Highly recommend this game and support for this developer!!!
replyContent: Thanks for reply. UPD: Check out new update, you now can return previous selections controls in game options.

content: Bought the pro version as a kudos to antiyoy and to the countless hours of fun without preservatives (ads) I had. For Vodobanka, it's challenging having to position my units in a way to anticipate incoming baddies through doors or see through windows (I am stingy with supplies). I would suggest a couple additions. Slightly smarter units / baddies in the way they move, look or enter a room. Maybe turn and look towards sound if someone shoots. Shoot sound seems sci-fi (lazers?). Soundtrack!

Great app by a really good little developer. Easy to pick up games. I've sunk a bit of time into Antiyoy and decided to support them after trying the tutorial and changing the difficulty up. Also no micro transactions, adwalls or other anti player monetisation. Will recommend to friends too :)
I loved the classic game layout shared by all the games.

There's not many developers I'd be comfortable seeing that there's a new game and then immediately buying and downloading it, but knowing how Yiotro builds games, and seeing the image previews and reviews for this was enough that I knew it'd be great without even trying it yet! Keep up the good work, Yiotro!

This game proves that you don't need fancy graphics to have hours of fun. I downloaded the free version first and got obsessed with it after 2 days. Just purchased the Pro version and I'm so happy with my level editor. Another game I'm obsessed with from this developer is Antiyoy. If play store had a counter of how many hours I played it, it would be above 500 hours.

This game is pretty awesome, great job! I'm glad to pay for it as I've had hours of fun playing Antiyoy for free already. I enjoy your games because of the simplicity and quickness of rounds/levels. Why I rated four stars: 1. Movement of teams into rooms. Look at US Army room clearing techniques and model them off of that, they would flow much better. 2. I can't figure out how to get them to engage an enemy who runs into the same room. Could the team scan/swivel when stationary?
replyContent: Thanks for reply. Just on tap on that enemy, it will give them command to run towards him and therefore look in his direction. Also, hint: you should use blockers and plan your route strategically to avoid these kinds of situations.

content: Looks good, but it feels way too easy and not sure my "strategy" was affecting the outcome. I would just enter rooms full of bad guys and they never shot back. I never lost a guy. Also, I feel like I should be able to control each units position and facing. As far as I could tell, I couldn't control either. The pawns would just get close to the point I selected and faced whatever directions they felt like. I don't think I got though the whole tutorial before I uninstalled, but I got to the...
replyContent: Thanks for reply. Default difficulty is very easy, but you can choose campaign difficulty at any point (on campaign screen). I recommend you to check out 'hard' difficulty, it will require some actual skill from you, especially starting from level 8 where your equipment becomes limited.

content: Came here from antiyoy one of my favorite games and this is just as good. worth the money. Keep making amazing games!!

I love your games, especially Antiyoy. There are simple, addictive, no ads and clear interface. I almost don't buy games, but this is will be my way of saying thanks, so, thanks and cheers from Brazil!
replyContent: Thank you too for your support :)

content: Bought immediately as a thank you for Antiyoy (a free game by the same author), but this game itself is definitely worth buying in any case. The only thing that makes me sad is the thought about the amount of time I'm going to spend in it :)
It's like a slow and weird, yet totally awesome interpretation of hotline miami. The soundtrack is slightly less pushing ;)
replyContent: Thanks for good reply. Wow, I didn't know that this game has soundtrack :D

content: Absolutly love this little tactival shooter. Some times, seems random. The level doesnt trigger the level complete on occassion.
replyContent: Thanks for good reply. Yes, it happens when player saw everything inside one of rooms (through windows, for example)  but didn't visit it. I'll fix it soon.

content: Great.
Got this because I enjoyed Antiyoy so much! Thanks for all the hard work.
replyContent: Thank you too for your support.

content: I have played all of your game's and enjoy them a lot, i decided to actually pay for one as thanks for not putting ads in your games.
Good game for small breaks

Huge fan of Antiyoy and played most of other games you have developed. Don't usually pay for games, but I am happy to pay for one after the countless hours of ad free fun I have had in your other games! Thank you for your development, I look forward to learning this new game.
replyContent: Thank you very much for your support :)

content: Very fun. (Lol thats all i have say lmao)
Good job! I like the game, you are very good at making clean interfaces and putting interesting gameplay in your work!
Another amazing game yiotro!
The Gameplay is Awesome!
